description: Volume attach fails on the Hyper-V driver due to an incorrect parameter in basevolumeutils.BaseVolumeUtils.get_iscsi_initiator()
title: Volume attach fails on Hyper-V

comments.content: Volume attach fails on the Hyper-V driver due to an incorrect parameter in basevolumeutils.BaseVolumeUtils.get_iscsi_initiator()
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/21677
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/21677
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/7d408aa8db7bcec158f9ab61702a39324cc8db28
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 7d408aa8db7bcec158f9ab61702a39324cc8db28
Author: Alessandro Pilotti <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Feb 11 20:53:04 2013 +0200

    Fixes a bug in attaching volumes on Hyper-V
    
    Fixes bug: #1122264
    
    The CIM v2 WMI context needs to be instantiated by the BaseVolumeUtils
    class and not passed by the caller of get_iscsi_initiator().
    
    Change-Id: I811b5bd0117b0035c18e5c90169b25a095bc54e9
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
